comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

PostScript L2, PCL5, PCL6
4/8/12MB std, depending on flavour. Wide Format printer - if the paper size exists, it can print on it up to Ledger and A3
Optional accessories are duplexer, 250 sheet tray, 500 sheet tray, hard drive, extra memory
Works well with the generic Postscript Driver

Consumables/Refills: Cartridge
